entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
